```{r, include = F}
library(tidyverse)

```

```{r}
acs_vars_2019_5yr <-
  listCensusMetadata(
    name = "2019/acs/acs5",
    type = "variables"
  )
```

```{r}
bay_county_names <-
  c(
    "Alameda",
    "Contra Costa",
    "Marin",
    "Napa",
    "San Francisco",
    "San Mateo",
    "Santa Clara",
    "Solano",
    "Sonoma"
  )

bay_tracts <-
  tracts("CA", bay_county_names, cb = T, progress_bar = F)

bay_multiple_tract <- 
  getCensus(
    name = "acs/acs5",
    vintage = 2019,
    region = "tract:*",
    regionin = "state:06+county:001,013,041,055,075,081,085,095,097",
    vars = c(
      "B06009_001E",
      "B06009_002E",
      "B06009_003E",
      "B19001_001E",
      "B19001_014E",
      "B19001_015E",
      "B19001_016E",
      "B19001_017E",
      "B19001A_001E"
    )
  ) %>% 
  transmute(
    tract = paste0(state, county, tract),
    perc_college = 1 - (B06009_002E + B06009_003E) / B06009_001E,
    perc_over100k = (B19001_014E + B19001_015E + B19001_016E + B19001_017E) / B19001_001E,
    perc_white = B19001A_001E / B19001_001E
  ) %>% 
  filter(
    !is.na(perc_college), 
    !is.na(perc_over100k),
    !is.na(perc_white)
  )
```

make into matrix form
```{r}
obs_matrix <-
  bay_multiple_tract %>% 
  select(
    perc_white, 
    perc_over100k,
    perc_college
  ) %>% 
  as.matrix()
```

mahalanobis 
```{r}
dist_matrix <- mahalanobis.dist(obs_matrix)

rownames(dist_matrix) <- bay_multiple_tract$tract
colnames(dist_matrix) <- bay_multiple_tract$tract
```

match pairs - closest tract
```{r}
dist_matrix_pairmatch <- dist_matrix

diag(dist_matrix_pairmatch) <- NA

matched_pair_tract <-
  1:nrow(dist_matrix_pairmatch) %>% 
  map_dfr(function(x){
    
    min_index <- which(dist_matrix_pairmatch[x, ] == min(dist_matrix_pairmatch[x, ], na.rm = T))
   
    data.frame(
      tract = bay_multiple_tract$tract[x],
      matched_tract = bay_multiple_tract$tract[min_index]
    )
    
  })

```

map of 20 matches
```{r}
match_set_tract <- dist_matrix["06081611900", ] %>% 
  as.data.frame() %>% 
  rownames_to_column() %>% 
  rename(
    tract = rowname,
    match = "."
  ) %>% 
  right_join(
    bay_multiple_tract
  ) %>% 
  arrange(match) %>% 
  .[1:21, ] %>% 
  left_join(bay_tracts %>% select(tract = GEOID)) %>% 
  st_as_sf()

leaflet() %>% 
  addProviderTiles(providers$CartoDB.Positron) %>% 
  addPolygons(
    data = match_set_tract[1, ],
    color = "red"
  ) %>% 
  addPolygons(
    data = match_set_tract[-1, ]
  )
```
